A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Better than The Force Awakens. Apart from a few issues it's a really good film\, The worst problems are Daisy Ridley's awful acting and that Kylo Ren is a terrible character\, he's just a boring whiney spoilt brat. Apart from these two\, the other actors are good and the film holds uo pretty well\, if you can forgive some large plot holes.
